summary: Computes the Receiver Operating Characteristic Area Under Curve (ROC AUC) for binary or multi‑class predictions, supporting macro, weighted, micro, and per‑class averaging, and handling both channel‑first and batch‑first tensor inputs while accumulating results across batches.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use evaluation metric for deep‑learning classification models, allowing developers and researchers to automatically track and compare model performance using ROC AUC within training and validation pipelines.
